Name: Directus
Overview:
An Instant App & API for your SQL Database.
Directus wraps your new or existing SQL database with a realtime GraphQL+REST API for developers, and an intuitive admin app for non-technical users.

@attributes.Name: WebUI
@attributes.Description: Container Port: 8055

@attributes.Name: Admin Email
@attributes.Description: The Direcuts Admin User Account. Feel free to change this to your email address.

@attributes.Name: Admin Password
@attributes.Description:
The Direcuts Admin User Account. Feel free to pass your desired password here,
otherwise a default password will be generated on first launch. (check logs!)

@attributes.Name: App Data/Uploads
@attributes.Description:
Container Path: /directus/uploads/

This is where your files get stored you upload to and manage within Directus

@attributes.Name: App Data/Extensions
@attributes.Description: Container Path: /directus/extensions/

@attributes.Name: App Data/Database (SQLite)
@attributes.Description: Only needed for SQLite environments

@attributes.Name: Database
@attributes.Description: What database client to use. One of pg or postgres, mysql, oracledb, mssql, or sqlite3.

@attributes.Name: Database Host
@attributes.Description: Database host. Required when using pg, mysql, oracledb, or mssql.

@attributes.Name: Database Port
@attributes.Description: Database port. Required when using pg, mysql, oracledb, or mssql.

@attributes.Name: Database Name
@attributes.Description: Database name. Required when using pg, mysql, oracledb, or mssql.

@attributes.Name: Database User
@attributes.Description: Database user. Required when using pg, mysql, oracledb, or mssql.

@attributes.Name: Database Password
@attributes.Description: Database user's password. Required when using pg, mysql, oracledb, or mssql.

@attributes.Name: KEY
@attributes.Description: Unique identifier for the project.

@attributes.Name: SECRET
@attributes.Description: Secret string for the project.

@attributes.Name: Database Filename
@attributes.Description: Where to read/write the SQLite database. Required when using sqlite3.

@attributes.Name: Postgres Connection String
@attributes.Description: When using pg, you can submit a connection string instead of individual properties. Using this will ignore any of the other connection settings.

@attributes.Name: PUID
@attributes.Description: Container Variable: PUID

@attributes.Name: PGID
@attributes.Description: Container Variable: PGID

@attributes.Name: UMASK
@attributes.Description: Container Variable: UMASK

@attributes.Name: TZ
@attributes.Description: Set your Time Zone here (e.g. Europe/Berlin)
